sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="u_project_effort"> <u_project_effort action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <sys_created_by>Sreerag.Anchery</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2025-03-26 07:26:51</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c36c1205c360221052237405e401314d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>Athul</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2025-05-21 07:51:52</sys_updated_on> <u_additional_comment/> <u_approval>requested</u_approval> <u_date>2025-03-25</u_date> <u_end_time>2025-03-25 17:30:08</u_end_time> <u_number>PE0001116</u_number> <u_other/> <u_project_name display_value="Blessing ITSM Project">51ca3392c308221052237405e4013194</u_project_name> <u_project_work>Story - Modify Departing User Completed the story, found a BR which clears the stockroom based on state, tried setWorkflow(false) - was not working, created an event to trigger the script action, inside script action, set the stockroom field.</u_project_work> <u_remarks/> <u_resourse display_value="Sreerag Anchery">902c62cac363121052237405e40131e0</u_resourse> <u_start_time>2025-03-25 11:00:53</u_start_time> <u_work_hour>6.49</u_work_hour> <u_work_notes/> </u_project_effort> </record_update>
